title: Jhin is so frustrating when you build crit on him
body:
SO frustrating

you build {{item:3142}} into {{item:3046}} 

you have 2 extreme situations with 30% crit

-3 crits in a row, followed by 4th hit
-0 crits in a row, and waste your 30% crit chance on 4th hit cause you have 100% crit chance on 4th hit

like jesus, it's so frustrating to play poker in this game, _**because if you're in 1v1 i can assure you that one of the two situation will make you auto-win the 1v1.**_

crit should be reworked, riot please.

replies.body:
Crit has always and will always be RNG unless specified otherwise. (Jhin's 4th shot, Shaco invisible auto attack, etc.) 
It makes crits less exploitable.

pretty sure its coded that you have a random number of basic attacks before the next crit automatically applies, or something along those lines so jhin having a garenteed crit on his 4th shot resets the number, so if you keep getting 5s and 6s jhin wont benefit as much from it.

but, his crit chance gives him more ad so its a trade off

Dancer's not an early item for Jhin anyways.
It'd be one of his last (pre-LW items), if at all.
Crit build is ER-IE-Shiv/RFC-Shiv/RFC (whichever one you didn't build)-Last Whisper evo, with boots somewhere in there around first/second.

i build pd second because jhin has no escape

12% damage reduction, massive mobility if people jump on you (combined with youmu and crit ms on hit) makes you escape a lot of diver

i just hate this rng thing
I do ER first then PD, but that's me.
It's just a byproduct of coincidental overlaps.
This is only for jhin, imo the crits are pretty ok.

i mean i agree that it's only for jhin

but how would you fixe this to not make it a poker game by playing jhin without reworking crit?
I mean, this is more of a Jhin problem because of his ammo system.
